name: Holebusters
description:
Holebusters

Lore:

The Supreme V not responding to FTL communication for few days. It is super secret facility that belongs to Supreme Collision company. The company is working in engine industry. They said the Supreme V is created for testing of black hole engines. And they are worrying their secret documents and expansive technology are in danger. That’s why we sending you, the Holebuster. You will check the situation down there and give us report about it. Let’s start your new mission. We wish you luck.

Control: 

Move - A, D or Left, Right Arrows

Jump - W, Space, Up Arrow

Interact - E

Shoot - Left Mouse
